topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543b58856368726f84de0200#post_543b58856368726f84de0200
You mean the roasted duck?
!http://fresh.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/roastduck_1.jpg!

It's like chicken. But with more bones, less stringier, more firm, darker, more fat, and a slight smoke like flavour. The skin is where most of the taste is concentrated. Slightly sweet, salty, and aromatic, smokey.

While classical western and east Asian, particularly the Japanese arsenals get the most disproportionate amount of attention in media. Indian, Middle Eastern, Chinese/Korean, and Native American weapons don't seem to get as much deserved love. C'mon, they have a lot of cool stuff too.
